About Me

Gabriel Wang

I identify myself as a FC Barcelona fan with go-to-expert level knowledge about Game of Throne and some bearable soccer skill. But other people keep saying that I am the most talented and dedicated Data Scientist they've ever worked with, I honestly don't know why :)

My Career

HEED LLC

I worked at HEED LLC as an Associate Data Scientist focusing on designing and implementing big data solution in sport business

Emory University

Research Assistant

CDC

I worked as a Data Engineer Intern at CDC designing and implementing Data Pipelines.

Data Engineer Intern
